divs: Sighting DetailsUpon entering my back yard which faces the headwaters of the East fork of the Arkansas River outside of Leadville, Colorado, I noticed that Venus seemed to be a bit bright. Then this object began to move around. I got my video camera and filmed it for 5 minutes. The object is circular with a ring of light around the bottom. It is pulsing rapidly through all the colors of the rainbow. During the 5 minutes that I was filming it it did not move except at the end of the film when it drops behind the ridge pos back up and dips below the ridge again. Thus and movement in the film is from me adjusting the tripod, or zooming in and out. The object did move quite a lot, just not while I was filming. Enjoy the video for it is very real. I used to say "I want to believe" now I believe but "I want to understand" !!
Summary: Colored bright disc over marsh behind my home!!
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Leadville
There were no other sightings in Leadville on or around June 18th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
